replies.body:
As the right hand of Shrek, the almighty, i know what is going on.
We have not worshiped Shrek enough by not building enough shrines, so Shrek is angry at us and as his wrath, he put some downtime on Avicus.
Luckily, you have me. I did my best to calm him down, and it seems i succeeded. For now.
We must start worshiping Shrek more or this might happen again, but more direly.
Best regards:
Shrek's right hand

replies.body:
I know, its part of EULA, it happend to my server as well, wasn't letting me start my server until I went into a txt folder called EULA.txt and had to change EULA : false
to EULA : True, its just making sure that the servers accept the EULA. Ivy probably didn't know what was going on until he looked at the consol or something.
